name: Jetson Media Desktop: An interactive Pitch
name_original: Jetson Media Desktop: An interactive Pitch
description:
Welcome to this pre-talk, with an expert Dialog Flow Bot, for any questions you may have. This is the Jetson Media Desktop, part of the One Quantum Tablet Per Child Project, part of a white paper on Open Technology and mathematical e-literacy.

For more details, browse:

https://onequantumtabletperchild.weebly.com/
